description: This file sets up an agent with an Azure AI Foundry model, downloads an image from a URL, reads the image as bytes, and prompts the agent to analyze the image with streaming response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with models and handles responses.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image, used for media input.

classes.name: AzureAIFoundry
classes.description: Azure-based AI Foundry model for image analysis.

methods.name: download_image
methods.description: Downloads an image from a URL to a specified output path.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response, optionally with images and streaming.
